rawText:
<
  T extends { [key: string]: string | string[] | undefined }
>(
  data: KeyValueMarkdownModelType[],
  {
    keyName,
    valueName,
    categoryStackCalculatedName,
    commentName,
  }: {
    /**
     * key by default
     */
    keyName?: string;
    /**
     * value by default
     */
    valueName?: string;
    /**
     * comment by default
     */
    commentName?: string;
    /**
     * categoryStackCalculated by default
     */
    categoryStackCalculatedName?: string;
  }
): T[] => {
  const newDataObject = data.map((item) => {
    const newData = {
      [keyName || "name"]: item.name,
      [valueName || "value"]: item.value,
      [commentName || "comment"]: item.comment,
      [categoryStackCalculatedName || "categoryStackCalculated"]:
        item.categoryStackCalculated,
    } as T;

    return newData;
  });

  return newDataObject;
}
name: kvmdDataMap
description:
DEPRECATED: probably never needed, unless I make it useful

mapper function to give a kvmd data object other parameters.

NB: not sure if this is useful. it would be useful if we could auto-generate the application of this function for multiple db models.
